locale.message: Better Password Plugin
Enable additional password requirements within PKP software. Primarily based on NIST recommendations.
Your password requires an alphabetic character.
Your password requires an uppercase character.

Your password requires an numeric character.
Your password requires an non-alphanumeric character.
Your password was found in a blacklist of known bad passwords.
Your account has been temporarily locked due to bad password attempts.
Settings
Better Password Settings

With this plugin enabled, user passwords will be checked against additional criteria to ensure better password selection. NIST recommends checking passwords against a blacklist and using temporary account locking. Complexity requirements of kinds of alphanumeric characters are available but not recommended.
Password requirements
Require an alphabetic character.
Require an uppercase character.
Require an lowercase character.
Require an numeric character.
Require an non-alphanumeric character.
Check any user-requested passwords against a blacklist of known bad passwords.
Temporary account locking
Number of bad login attempts after which to lock an account.
Number of seconds before forgetting bad login attempts.
Number of seconds to lock an account after excessive bad login attempts.
If any temporary account locking setting is entered, all temporary account locking settings are required.
